channel.title: Need hoster!
channel.description:
i need a hoster for my server, i will make you owner on the massacre and ++ you if you can do it
[size=15pt] Please contact me through MSN, my name is "The-Darkness@fbi.gov" If you have something else you would like to use, pm me with whatever your using and you're name on it[/size]
you must agree to my terms of service...
• You may not release the source to anyone • You may not abuse your powers on the server • You may not change anything in the source in any way without permission • You cannot keep the server down for fun 0.o
Here are the requirements...
• Must use a no-ip address, preferably "themassacre.no-ip.org" • Must have around 700 mb of RAM • Must keep it up around 18/7 at least • Optional: • Auto-restarter
thanks, ~Teh_Hacker

item.title: Need hoster!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzo Zenzo
item.description:
@Zenzo wrote:

only if its a 1337 server.

Read full topic
